item.title: My Objective in 2026
item.description:
I’m trying to improve my English.

It is my objective in 2026 to talk with anyone by English. That’s reason why I write this blog post. I’ll keep it everyday. As far as I’m concerned, My traits might be fitted on oversea cultures rather than other. So I need improve my English, especially speaking skill.

I’ve got the impression that the market should be placed more priority than politics.

Dec 12, 2025
